Posts.Content: jeaclark wrote: I found a lump last week.  It is on my left breast on the side; not in the armpit but on that side of the breast near the armpit.  It is about two inches long and feels like a bean or small thin carrot.  My mamogram and sonogram are scheduled for tomorrow.  I am so scared.  I've not told anyone but my husband and don't want to get everyone upset so have kept it to myself.  I just want to have the results and not keep waiting.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I found a lump last week jeaclark bluesgrl

Posts.Content: Aug 2, 2010 03:59PM jeaclark wrote: I hope all goes well with your mammo.  I too have a mammo and sonogram tomorrow.  I am nervous and scared.  Mine is on my left breast near the chest wall.  It is long and skinny; about two inches long like a fat string bean. I just want tomorrow to come and be over with the results so I know what to do next if anything.
Posts.Title: Very Worried Mammo tomorrow Sarah76 jeaclark
